description: Pre-cooked lentils make this summery salad quick and easy to whip up, perfect with griddled halloumi and lots of zingy lemon.
name: Lentil, Lemon & Grilled Halloumi Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the spring onions, spinach, pomegranate seeds and lentils together in a large bowl and mix in the dressing. Divide between 4 plates, top with griddled halloumi and extra coriander, if desired.
